general_info.summary: This document outlines various aspects of Sharda University's operations and offerings, covering academic programs for 2025-26, details on its Schools of Dental, Medical, and Nursing Sciences, examination reports, academic credit systems, curriculum feedback, and university brochures. It also includes information on leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, university acts, COVID-19 resources, various skill enhancement and counselling services, entrepreneurship initiatives, FM radio, accommodation, visa and insurance guidelines, observership programs, mentoring, recruitment, and international collaborations.
